FCCANALYSIS-FINAL(1) fccanalysis-final man page FCCANALYSIS-FINAL(1)

NAME

fccanalysis-final – finalize your analysis into histograms

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis final [-h | --help] [-g | --graph] [--graph-path GRAPH_PATH]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis-final runs the last stage of the analysis, where one defines final cuts and histograms. This stage can also output ROOT and LaTeX files for further use.

OPTIONS

-h, --help
Prints short help message and exits.
-g, --graph
Generates computational graph of the analysis.
--graph-path GRAPH_PATH
Analysis graph save path, should end with '.dot' or '.png'.

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis(1)

BUGS

Many
